info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:13PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Heavy Rain Showers will impact portions of northeastern Warren, south central Rock Island, Mercer and southwestern Henry Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 308 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain showers from near Illinois City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Torriential Rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized Flooding. Locations impacted include... Aledo, Burgess, Viola, New Windsor, Millersburg, Matherville, Reynolds, Eliza, Joy, North Henderson, Hamlet, Shale City, Boden, Illinois City, Alexis, Coldbrook, Gerlaw, Aledo Mercer County Airport, Gingle Corners and Sunbeam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: These rain showers are producing very heavy rain in a short amount of time, with rainfall amounts around one to two inches possible in the heaiviest activity. Rainfall of this magnitude, may lead to localized flood and ponding of water. Do no drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
